channel.title: Need help with my java jdk
channel.description:
I just got a new pc my last one kinda messed up and i had a server on it so i got to make it on this pc now any way.
i folllod this guys guide http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285415.0.html it messed up my java now befor i did this guys guide my java wokred it let me run servers and it let me run clients but now i cant run none i cant even play runescape!
when i try and run my client it comes up 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. prees any key to continue . . .
and when i try and run a server it comes up for like 2secounds then goes again then wont come up at all.
please any help.
and what happed to the last guide for a server it was much better this guy messed up my pc now..
-rob thanks

item.title: Need help with my java jdk
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:2, topic:218470”]Set your Environmental Variables. Don’t know how to? Google.
Classpath: CLASSPATH="path\to\jdk\bin";

Path: "path\to\jdk\bin";
Also, KEEP the quotes in there, if you remove them it will not work.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my java jdk
